skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Deliver intuitive user interfaces using languages and frameworks including JavaScript, React and Vue, ensuring alignment with strategic goals

skills.title: UI Design

skills.title: Project Management

portfolio.title: Delish
portfolio.description: Front-end web app for recipes and meal planning services. React, HTML, CSS, Splide, Auth0, Spoonacular (3rd Party API).

portfolio.title: Theme Generator
portfolio.description: Full-stack CRUD web app offering expansive AI-generated web styling properties. Uses JavaScript, CSS, Express, Node.js, MongoDB, Google OAuth, OpenAI.

portfolio.title: Moda
portfolio.description: Full-stack e-commerce application for fashion products with secure log-in and payment processes. Uses Vue, HTML, CSS, Vuetify, Express, Node.js, MongoDB, Auth0, Stripe.
